article_title: Under Affordable Care Act, As Government Pays Has Healthcare Cost Exceeded Sustainable Levels?

article_metadata.description: In an unregulated environment of medical costs and insurance premiums, can the United States avoid moving towards a single-payer healthcare system or Medicare for all? In addition, can the U.S. continue to subsidize the rest of the world’s drug and healthcare prices by paying significantly more than any other country [...]
article_metadata.author: Steven Delco
